channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
O.K I've added in Higher XP and i made a mistake going though the Herblores... And i've got 1 error...
[code]client.java:16357: not a statement <"You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.">; ^
1 Error Files Compilded Succesfully! Press any key to Continue . . .[/code]
Any help :S
My Theroy is, Where the " ^ " is Pointing to, is where the Error is.. And also I don't know where that is :( Is there any "Key" or something that you press that can take you to the Line the Error is at?

item.title: Client Help

item.description:
@system wrote:

Log into my Server… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,138371.msg1334951.html#msg1334951

Look at the UPDATES I’ve Added, Raed ALL of the Post

No problemo

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hell YEAH!! Found it, One was missing sendMessage… THANK you Gunz [Cough]REP++[/cough]

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“gunztheduel, post:7, topic:96185”]Take out the “sendMessage” part. Just search for “You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.” then replace it with

sendMessage(“You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.”);[/quote]

Do this…^

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“VorargC, post:6, topic:96185”]line 16357 of client.java
go edit>go to
then type 16357[/quote]

Go To is Not Enabled… It is Grey, Not black…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Take out the “sendMessage” part. Just search for “You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.” then replace it with

sendMessage(“You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.”);

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I did… And there are TONS of them… Listen

You don’t get waht i mean

I know the line should be

sendMessage("You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.");

But, the Compiler Says

<“You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.”>;
^

Where the " ^ " is, That is there the Error is, But when i type CTRL + F and type in

sendMessage("You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.");

I sytart at the TOP of My Client.Java and I click the “DOWN” option and it says It Can’t Find it and then when i go to the Bottom of my Client.Java, And Click the “up” Option It can see it… What i am getting at, I have looked though ALL of them and there is NO Error that the Compiler Says not in ONE of them… I am Confused

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel

Ctrl + F and search for that phrase lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Yea, Well, I can’t find the Error, That’s waht i mean, I can’t find it, Give me some sort of Indacation that you know where the Error is…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

The proper line should be -

sendMessage("You need a Higher Herblore level to make this Potion.");

Read full topic
